name: FlexWiki syntax highlighting
description:
Syntax highlighting for FlexWiki, http://www.flexwiki.com/ Also a filetype detection script which sets appropriate buffer-local options for editing long lines, etc.

Latest copy can be found at http://www.georgevreilly.com/vim/flexwiki/

More details can be found at http://www.flexwiki.com/default.aspx/FlexWiki/VimPluginForFlexWiki.html

This is included in Vim 7.0
install_details:
Create a HOME directory, if you haven't already
Create a "vimfiles" (Windows) or ".vim" (Unix/Mac) folder in your HOME directory.
Unzip stwiki.zip in that vimfiles (.vim) folder.
Restart Vim

See ":help add-global-plugin" for more details

versions.release_notes: Upload the version that's included with Vim 7.0
